external_games.name: Extreme Catch: Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator

name: Extreme Catch: Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator
summary: Set sail on an exhilarating maritime journey with "Extreme Catch: Boat Crab & Fishing Simulator." Step into the role of a professional crab catcher navigating the treacherous waters of Alaska. Manage your ship, tackle dangerous weather, and capture crabs in the vast Bering Sea. Experience thrilling quests and challenges as you strive to build your fortune and become a legend on the open seas.
